item.description:
Come celebrate the old year and ring in then new with old and new friends. We'll have good company, food, drinks, and even music and dancing - (we'll find a way - it's Alisa's!)

We are looking for this to be finger foods and deserts. You can bring a dish or drinks to share. We do have music, but if you have some favorites by all means bring them along. CD's, tapes and even vinyl!

We start at 6 and end when we end - bring a designated driver or a sleeping bag if you need to crash.

Parking should be fun. Car pool if you can. There are also side streets.

Anyone who needs a phone num please email Alisa or Margaret.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Let's Ring in the New Year!!
